Name: Infiltrator Squad
Description:
Squad composed of Infiltrator agents. Infiltrator Squad can use abilities to perform covert operations. Can use Scorched-Earth Command.

Can attack the ground and air.
Can replace workers to collect special item.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Deploy 9 Spider Mines to target location. Mines can sense and attack nearby enemies and deal massive amount of aoe dmg.
Root.Name: Deploy Spider Mine

Root.Tooltip: Squad Leader will throw a Smoke Grenade. Create a smoke at target area. Enemies within will have way less attack range and 50% less movement speed. Last 5 sec.
Root.Name: Smoke Grenade

Root.Tooltip:
Cloak the squad for 15 sec.
When cloaked, their movement speed will increase by 20%.
Root.Name: Cloaking Gadget

Root.Tooltip: Gestalt Zero's tactic squad can gain experience in combat to achieve higher ranking, gaining additional abilities and have slightly improved stats. Squad will gain experience equal to twice of the supply cost for every enemy unit killed nearby. If a tactic squad dealt the killing blow, it will gain additional 100% experience.
Root.Name: Gestalt Ranking

Root.Tooltip: Receive a dose of stim after attacked by enemies. It will increase their movement speed and heal them. Last for 5 sec.
Root.Name: Stim Gauntlet

Root.Tooltip: Paralyze target mechanic unit and stun it for 10 sec. Cannot target heroic unit.
Root.Name: Cochannel Hacking

Root.Tooltip: Switch the weapon of this tactic squad.
Root.Name: Switch Armory

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Recruit a soldier for the squad. At most 4 soldiers can be recruited.
Root.Name: Recruit Soldier

Root.Tooltip:
Order all tactic bombers to launch a round of incendiary munitions to target area. It can deal 260 dmg to enemy ground units within and leave a burning ground last for 20 sec which will deal 30 dmg per sec to the area.

Airstrike Order CD applies to all Tactic Squad.
More Gestalt Bomber Platforms you have, larger the area Airstrike Order can apply to.
Root.Name: Scorched-Earth Command

Root.Tooltip:
Order all tactic bombers to launch a round of incendiary munitions to target area. It can deal 260 dmg to enemy ground units within and leave a burning ground last for 20 sec which will deal 30 dmg per sec to the area.

Airstrike Order CD applies to all Tactic Squad.
More Gestalt Bomber Platforms you have, larger the area Airstrike Order can apply to.
Root.Name: Scorched-Earth Command

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Tactical Rifle. Basic common use weapon.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Tactical Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Shotgun. Can deal aoe dmg.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Shotgun

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Shotgun. Can deal aoe dmg.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip Shotgun

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Alpha Sniper Rifle. Ranged weapon effective against Bio units.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Alpha Sniper Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Alpha Sniper Rifle. Ranged weapon effective against Bio units.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Alpha Sniper Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Disintegrator Rifle. Can reduce enemies' armor.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Disintegrator Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Disintegrator Rifle. Can reduce enemies' armor.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Disintegrator Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Death Watch. Extremely effective against massive bio units.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Death Watch

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Death Watch. Extremely effective against massive bio units.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Death Watch

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Hellfire Laser. Extremely effective against mechanic units.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Hellfire Laser

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Hellfire Laser. Extremely effective against mechanic units.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip Hellfire Laser

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel
